title: Jim Kenney
added: The 3rd Circuit Court of Appeals struck down Kenney's efforts to open safe injections sites.  The Court relied on a federal law known as the "Crack House" statute.<ref>{{Cite web|last=|first=|date=|title=www.npr.org|url=https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2021/01/14/956428659/in-philadelphia-judges-rule-against-opening-a-medical-site-to-safely-inject-hero#:~:text=Live%20Sessions-,Court%20Rules%20Philly%20Group%20Can't%20Open%20'Supervised'%20Injection,called%20federal%20crack%20house%20law.|url-status=live|archive-url=|archive-date=|access-date=|website=}}</ref>
